channel.title: Runescape EOC IRC Dicing? Looking for people to create a clan
channel.description: Wondering if any of you would that play EOC would be interested in making an EOC dicing clan over IRC. We could get alot of people to come bet I would need some help setting up the script but it would be loads of fun. Anyone interested?

item.title: Runescape EOC IRC Dicing? Looking for people to create a clan
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“darkpk owner, post:6, topic:548758”]Dicing is still very alive through irc if you guys don’t know.[/quote]I’m well aware there are still people out there who dice. However the general population will not be supporting it any longer. They truly saw how much damage it did after it was removed.

For that matter, there are still merching clans out there.

Read full topic
item.source: Runescape EOC IRC Dicing? Looking for people to create a clan
